website_summaries.verdict: One of the highest-rated poncho packs available for purchase, this disposable set will keep your entire family dry.
pros: Comes in a pack of 8 for easy family coverage
cons: Tends to get hot when wearing
Does not last for more than a week

customer_reviews.title: You get a poncho, and you get a poncho, and you get a poncho, everyone gets a poncho!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the family pack right before a family trip to Disney world. Great purchase. Sleeves have elastic cuffs and the hood has a drawstring. It rained today while we were at Magic Kingdom and the ponchos definitely came in handy! I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend!
customer_reviews.author: danielboonecounty

customer_reviews.title: Super great poncho
customer_reviews.text: I ran the infamous Boston Marathon 2018 in this poncho. If you did not hear, drenching freezing rain, 30-40 degrees and 20-30 mph headwinds were the conditions. I ran the first 10 miles in this poncho. I actually gave out the other 3 to people with other ponchos that were trash compared to this one. This had elastic around the arms and a drawstring around the hood. This was the single best decision I made the whole race 😂. The poncho was perfect, the shipping was fast. If I could give 10 stars, I would.
customer_reviews.author: traci wright finley

customer_reviews.title: Great for Theme Park Use
customer_reviews.text: The ponchos were lightweight and easy to fold down, but we’re good quality. The adult size has the draw string hood and elastic at the wrists, but the kid size does not. It was nice to have the colored ponchos; our family stood out in the sea of clear ponchos at Universal Orlando and Disney World. The kid size was a little smaller than expected, especially arm length. Pictured are my average size 6 and 9 year olds.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni King

customer_reviews.title: Good for a family of 5 Disney World trip
customer_reviews.text: Bought this pack for our week-long family Disney World vacation. Despite the threat of rain all week, we only needed to break them out once. They come in individual zip-loc bags making them easy to store in our backpack. Elastic at the wrists is a nice touch to keeping out the rain. Draw strings are on the adult ponchos only, and help sinch the hood around your face. After we wore them, it is possible to get them back into the storage bags, but it was tough. They do take up more room after putting them back in the storage bags. Overall, good quality. Not the thickets ponchos I've ever worn, but they were just right for the trip.
customer_reviews.author: Webb Pickersgill

customer_reviews.title: Best poncho EVER
customer_reviews.text: Best poncho EVER!!! After researching every poncho out there, I went with these. We brought them on our Disney trip (with Hurricane Irma) and they were great. Now to be fair, we didn't wear them during the hurricane but we did reuse them for 5 days. We used two adult and one child poncho for 5 days! Unheard of in the poncho world. I packed them up and brought them home. These are worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: CTMOM

customer_reviews.title: Not for pouring rainy weather.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap plastic. You get what you pay for. We had this at Disney for the 4th of July and we all got soaked. My hubby is 6ft tall and the poncho was way too small. The sleeves came to his elbows. And yes, he was wearing the adult size.
customer_reviews.author: Kim W

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight! Perfect for hot humid Disney days!
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for our Disney trip! It rained on us while visiting the Animal Kingdom. I was so grateful to have purchased these prior to our trip. They fit conveniently in the bottom of my backpack. Our family of five were happy and dry. Our three year old is a little guy and the kid size was great. Our seven year old was also appropriate for the child size. My husband, myself and our ten year old (who is 5’0) wore the adult sizes. We would recommend these to anyone. They worked great! I even wore mine with my backpack on. Plenty of room!! They are thin but reusable. We also used them for sea world!
customer_reviews.author: D. PETERSON

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered while at Disney World since our first set only made it a week. These appeared much better... not true. First night wearing them they tore and were not at all as described.
customer_reviews.author: Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Beware -No strings
customer_reviews.text: These say they have elastic wrist but as you can see in the photo, they do not. They also do not have a draw string on the hood. These are super thin with open arms much like a kitchen garbage bag with holes. Not sure why they say with strings when there aren’t any. You get what you pay for I guess. Fortunately we didn’t need them anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They loved them!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and son went on a week long camping trip where it rained allllllllll week! It was crazy! My husband said that he loved the ponchos they held up extremely well! Unfortunately my son decided to poke holes in his poncho with his fingers.... ugh ...but that’s my son it has nothing to do with the quality of the product! My husband said it was very comfortable he had plenty of room to move around with it. He is 200lbs 5’10”. Most importantly it kept them dry!!
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Easy to pack and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We packed these ponchos for a family trip to Disneyland. The adult size fit our tallest family member at 6'6, but fit like a 3/4 length sleeve. It did fit over the torso - and he was wearing a small backpack. The hood seemed almost too small for the adults in our group but they worked during a sudden downpour. The children sizes were long enough but fell short on their arms. They were sturdy and we let them dry overnight, then packed them up for the next day in the park.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Mrs. K

customer_reviews.title: Glad I ordered these ponchos!
customer_reviews.text: The quality is actually better than I expected, a little thicker. Love that. Also, the different colors make it easy for people can keep track of 'their own' poncho. I'm not a large person, so if necessary I will wear a Child size poncho (the sleeves will be short) if my daughters need all six (6) Adult size ponchos for their families. Besides rain and drizzle protection, these are perfect right NOW because of the coronavirus. Besides a mask and gloves, I will be wearing a poncho with the hood up and tied whenever necessary to go out to the store for essentials!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Pence

customer_reviews.title: Incorrectly Labeled
customer_reviews.text: This product would have worked out well, but major problem with labeling. We took two adult and two kids ponchos from the box for our trip. When is started to pout rain and pulled them out of the pouches we found that they were all children's size. Needless to say, the two adults got drenched. The labels on each packet clearly said adult.

customer_reviews.title: Fun colors and good fit!!
customer_reviews.text: These worked great for our rainy day at the zoo. The only complaint I’d have is the string for the hood. There needs to be a way to prevent them from going all the way through and pulling out. We tied a million knots in ours because the string came out of two of the ponchos and we couldn’t get them back in. Loved that they had the draw string hoodie though!!! The length was good, the colors where bright and fun. No need to bundle up underneath since you stay rather warm in it by itself in my opinion. Loved the elastic on the wrists. That was nice to have! I’d order these again.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Good, affordable product.
customer_reviews.text: Good for a disposable product. Sufficiently sized for average sized adults and average sized children (ours are 5, 10, and 13 years old). We used them to keep from getting soaked on the rides at Disneyland and they fit the bill. Could probably get a few more uses out of them. This is definitely the most affordable and convenient way to go - I think the ponchos at Disneyland were $8 or $10/each.
customer_reviews.author: LVChick

customer_reviews.title: Rain Poncho
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this pack to take along on our Disney trip. They are very reasonably priced but do have limitations. They are very thin and tend to cling to you which makes you hot and sticky if you need to wear them for a long time. The children’s version does not have a string closure around the hood. This is disappointing be Use the kiddos need that feature the most. The hoods kept blowing off my grandchildren’s heads. We were able to re use them once. Overall, fir a temporary need, they are well priced bu5 could use a few improvements even if it cost a little more.
customer_reviews.author: O. Rawcliffe

customer_reviews.title: Good quality poncho
customer_reviews.text: We bought these ponchos for Disneyworld. We definitely needed them! We wore them when it rained ALL day at Magic Kingdom. They held up and kept us mostly dry. We took them on and off throughout the day and they didn't rip or tear. The adult ones have strings at the hood to tie it off and are cuffed at the wrist which helped keep the water out. The children's sizes did not have those features so my daughters sleeves at the end did get wet, but she pulled her arms into the poncho during heavy rains to stay more dry. These ponchos were a fair price and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for our trip to Disneyworld because I wanted something that was more compact to carry than a rain jacket for each of us and that covered more than just our top halves. The whole family used these both on the water rides at Disneyworld and during the brief rain showers that came down during our visit. They were lightweight, covered most of our body and it was great having the hoods. It was also nice to have both the kid and adult sizes in one pack. Once our trip was over we tossed them and didn't have to take up suitcase space which was also nice.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie's World of Books

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Bought the ponchos in anticipation of a trip to an amusement park. These definitely came in handy and kept us pretty dry during a downpour! Only reason I didn't give 5 stars is that the kids ponchos seem to be of a slightly lesser quality, as my son's tore by the hoodie (and I really wish the kids one had a tie for the hood, as the hood kept falling off. All in all, no regrets and for the price, I really think you can't go wrong with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Disney!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great product to buy for a recent Disney trip. The ponchos came folded up individually in small packs and were easy to throw in my bag whenever the forecast called for rain. We used them once. They were lightweight, not something that could be used many times in my opinion but perfect for what I got them for. Also cheap enough to throw away after use without feeling bad about it. If you’re looking for a thick, heavy duty product this is not it. But if you need something cheap and easy for a specific purpose - like a Disney trip I’d recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: AMS

customer_reviews.title: Unexpected Use
customer_reviews.text: I had them packed in our beachbags for a kayaking trip but didn't need them. Went to the water park the next day where a huge storm broke out. Since we still had these packed, we put them on to try and sit out the storm. They kept us warm and dry for an hour before we gave up and left the park. When I got home, I tossed them in the dryer on Air and they dried fine. I packed them in baggies and they are ready for the next emergency.
customer_reviews.author: Conspicuous ConsumerTop Contributor: Jigsaw Puzzles

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Pros: sleeves have elastic band at the end. face hole has a drawstring. Cons: face hole drawstring ripped out with minor use. seams on 6 of the ponchos ripped after 2 hours of light use (walking and sitting) rendering them useless. We ended up having to buy replacement ponchos, so these were a complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: TheOneBob

customer_reviews.title: Not as durable as I thought
customer_reviews.text: We used these for 6 hours in the rain yesterday, and while they were a little thick I didn't find them to be that durable. One had a huge rip in it right out of the bag and another got another rip later on and wasn't snagged on anything just out of nowhere ripped. When I ordered I thought these could be reused but that really isn't the case. The child's size was too small for my 7 year old, the sleeves only covered half of his arms. The adult size is more suited for kids ages 6 and over.
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS

customer_reviews.title: They did what they were supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: It was pouring rain in New Orleans and they kept us nice and dry. They were thicker than the ones that were for sale there but not too thick.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Saewert

customer_reviews.title: Misleading description of ponchos
customer_reviews.text: I have to start by saying the adult ponchos were great! However, the description states that the ponchos have drawstring hoods and long sleeves with elastic around the wrists. The adult ponchos do, but the child ones do not. This is not mentioned in the product description. My two children and I got stuck in a heavy downpour at Acadia Nat'l Park in Maine over the weekend and the kids got absolutely soaked.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: These were great at Disney. Super durable. Took them off and put them back on a few times. Not tears or stretching. I did throw away after the 1st use because I didn't want to carry or struggle folding it but I could have definitely reused it more than 2 days. The size is awesome. I had a large back pack underneath and didnt get wet. All the water rides were a breeze no water seeping in or anything. The kids size is super great, not too big or small or uncomfortable. It was the 1st time the girls wore a poncho and didn't have any complaints
customer_reviews.author: Alecan2

customer_reviews.title: Easy to wear, keeps you dry
customer_reviews.text: Great price and good quality. the material is thin, but still reasonably durable, and for the price you can not beat it. If you are careful, you can get many wears out of one of these. The neck has a drawstring which really keeps you dry. They are individually bagged and very compact when stored. I have them in my spare tire compartment for emergencies, and at home on a closet shelf.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: We brought these for our upcoming trip to Disney World! While the trip likely won’t be happening, the children sized ponchos are perfect. They fit my almost 3 year old! I wish the adult ponchos came in smaller packaging. I’ll chalk it up to a thicker than usual material, but it definitely means we won’t be traveling with all the adult ones because of limited space issues.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie M

customer_reviews.title: Don't go to Disney World without these!
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely satisfied with this purchase. The ponchos were exactly as described, packaged well, and came on time. They were a godsend for my family at Disney World. I would not go to Disney World or to any outdoor venue during the summer without them. I would buy these again and recommend them to others.
customer_reviews.author: Grandmother librarian

customer_reviews.title: Decent adult ponchos, kids ponchos could be better
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our recent summer Disney World trip, and they worked as well as could be. The adult ones fit as expected although the sleeves were too short for me. I liked that they had elastic openings on the sleeves, and a draw string in the hood to pull it tight, but the kids ponchos didn't have these. Our kid's poncho hood kept slipping off their head and they eventually got frustrated and just took it off.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ruzin

customer_reviews.title: Great for Disney!
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this set for our Disney trip nest week!! They are exactly what I was looking for and it looks like we may have to use them while there due to forecasted showers. I will update with photos next week! Loved the price and sizes included!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Turner

customer_reviews.title: The drawstrings and elastic sleeves are a big plus
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a multi-generation family trip to Disney World. Kept us dry during some brief rain showers (there were a couple or 'splash' rides that I wished we packed them for on a different, sunny day). You do have to be careful that things don't poke through and rip the material, but most of them we are able to reuse. The drawstring hood and elastic sleeves provided better protection and made it much easier to move around and see where your're going. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: VTLINC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Disney!
customer_reviews.text: These worked great for us last week at Disney! Easy to pack in luggage and our backpacks for the park. And helped when it rained! My son took his off a few times and it never tore or anything. The only thing is the tie for the hood comes out easily so tell kiddos not to play with it if you want it to stay 😉 But highly recommend! Great price for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: beara1701

customer_reviews.title: Missing drawstrings
customer_reviews.text: The first and only poncho we opened was missing drawstrings. Didn’t even see a place to run a drawstring through. Without this I knew it wasn’t going to fit my son correctly as he is on the smaller side. Opening for his head way too large and loose to cover him. Didn’t use any of them
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Martin

customer_reviews.title: Handy When Needed
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for a recent trip to Disney World. We also noticed several other people had the same ponchos. They were extremely compact and took up very little space. We carried them in our bag daily and used them a handful of times. They were super convenient and folded back nicely after using them. The string on the hood was a nice feature to have in the wind and rain. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: HPagesT

customer_reviews.title: We actually got to use them on our last day which was both a good and bad thing
customer_reviews.text: We brought these for our family trip to Disneyland in early January. We actually got to use them on our last day which was both a good and bad thing. I was very grateful to have these when the rain hit and I loved the elastic at the wrists of the adult ponchos to keep the rain out, however the kid sizes did not come with the elastic. I only wish they did so my daughter could have been just as protected as I was. However, I would definitely purchase again but they are also really one time use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality Ponchos
customer_reviews.text: These ponchos are much better quality then the ones they sell in a pharmacies. Came in a very nice packaged box and each poncho is individually packaged in a plastic zip lock to re use. . I Put a few in my car for emergencies and our family used it for an outdoor concert last weekend and they were perfect! I stand 6'1 and it fit really well. The long sleeves , elastic band and string on the hood prevented it from flapping around like those cheap trash bag types. My children loved the different colors as well. After use we packed them back in the zip lock bag so we can use it again. I highly recommend Lingitos ponchos.
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

customer_reviews.title: Rain poncho
customer_reviews.text: We are going to DC for enchantment Christmas. This is great to have just in case. They were calling for 70 percent chance of rain. That could have been a disaster. You can wear your warm coats and put this poncho over. Would be great for Disney too. Are they fashionable..lol..no but do their job. Yet colorful. Light enough to put away when stops raining. Not that expensive could throw away..but I am tight.
customer_reviews.author: Kirby Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great for Disney trip
customer_reviews.text: We went to Disney world in May and took these with us, Family of 3, 2 adults and 1 child. We all used 2, they fit in my suitcase easy and then in my park bag. We took them on and off as needed in the parks but they kept up dry, dried off fast and were able to re wear them the 2 days it rained. I had a plastic bag as well that I put them inside when wet until we needed them again. Would repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: J. Richman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect family pack poncho for Disney land.
customer_reviews.text: These ponchos are most def thicker and better quality then the other ones I have ordered in the past. The adult size was perfect. The draw string made it fit my head nicely even on the rides. The child size was great for my 6 and 8 year old. Saved a lot of money not buying them in Disney for 5-6 bucks a piece.
customer_reviews.author: moshe markovich

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE for anyone going to Disney
customer_reviews.text: I love these ponchos! They are not flimsy like some that you get. They were PERFECT for our trip to Disney World. I love the fact that each person could pick there own color and they could keep track of their poncho - the pack has 4 colors each of adult and children sizes. They also folded neatly after use and I was able to put them back in the individual ziplock bag which made it much easier to put in the backpack for the day. I would DEFINITELY recommend these rain ponchos.
customer_reviews.author: Anna B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect travel poncho's
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a family trip to Disneyland and when it got closer to the date of trip the weather had turned and there was a good chance of rain. As it turned out we didn't need them for any rain but we did use them on the log ride where you get drenched and we were safe and water free. The ponchos are well made and have elastic around the cuffs of the sleeves. You won't be sorry and will be prepared in the event you encounter water from any source.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Easy for travel and durable
customer_reviews.text: These are really good. There are different colors for 6 adults and children. They’re light weight but have elastic bands around the wrists to keep the sleeves in place. The hood has a string to tie around the chin so it doesn’t fly open. Very easy to pack in luggage as it’s in a small package for storage. Recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: msilver

customer_reviews.title: Raining at the Zoo
customer_reviews.text: I chaperoned for a field trip to the Zoo and kept several of these in my back pack. When it started to rain, I was able to get these on all of the students in my group (various sizes) and myself. Did a great job keeping us dry. I was pleasantly surprised because I've had some before that were too thin and tore easy or ones that just didn't fit right.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua B. Marsh

customer_reviews.title: These worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: My dog had surgery and came home from the hospital with a chest wrap, surgi-sox, and large bandage. I purchased this mixed collection of pull-over rain jackets to keep her dry on our walks when it rained. They worked perfectly! She may not look happy in the photo, but she loved all of the attention she got.
customer_reviews.author: L Blair

customer_reviews.title: Kept my fam dry!
customer_reviews.text: Used these at Disneyland for Splash Mountain and they did the trick. But did't wear them around in the rain or anything like that. They don't seem to be the most durable (not sure about multiple uses), but again, I don't think that is the point with this product. They were small, light, stored/carried easily, and kept us dry on the water rides we went on.
customer_reviews.author: Einstein for Everyone

customer_reviews.title: Not as thick as I was hoping for
customer_reviews.text: These are a solid product for one time use. They aren't thick enough to be used multiple times. My son and I took these on a camping trip with his Cub Scout den and it rained for most of the day on Saturday. By the time the rain stopped and I took my poncho off it ripped and needed to be thrown away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: They worked out great for our trip to Orlando! We only got rained on once and they held their ground and kept us dry. The hood was definitely worth it as everyone around us with the standard poncho were soaked. We also took it on a water ride and kept dry and it’s long enough to cover your bottom so your shorts don’t get wet from the water ride! My only side note was I didn’t realize there was two child sizes and the adult ones were just clear not colored
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. A storm caught my two kids, my wife and me on the street while walking back from Universal to our hotel and these ponchos did endure the storm keeping us dry from our knees up. I do not recommend using disposable ponchos during a storm, since they are not made for this kind of situations but Lingitos are thicker than I though and durable.... 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Joslin De La Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Good quality ponchos
customer_reviews.text: I tried on the adult size and it fit really nicely. The end of the sleeves have light elastic to keep the water out and the hood also has a drawstring. I’m 5’2” and they end about mid-calf. We bought these for Disneyworld where we heard there are thundershowers in the afternoons. We will also use them on the water rides. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lu

customer_reviews.title: Hot, not breathable
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to have at Disney in July. We did have to use them as it rained every day. The type of plastic this is does not breathe AT ALL. It’s hot and stuck to my already-sweaty skin. Also the kid size is for SMALL kids, not my 11-year-old. She used the adult size. I ended up buying a poncho from Disney made out of vinyl. It was much cooler that these plastic ones.
customer_reviews.author: Sue S

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: The ponchos are great. We already used them and it works Couple of Minor things but could become a challenge for heavy rains 1. hoodie string end for one of the adult poncho had retracted and hence couldn’t tie the ends 2. Child ponchos don’t have the hoodie string Recommendation to have hoodie strings for kids and a way to prevents the hoodie string Los from retracting will make it a a superior product
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Highly Effective - Multiple Sizes a Great Bonus!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a recent trip to Walt Disney World and they worked great. We went to one of the Very Merry Christmas Party’s and it POURED. These kept us nice and dry. As a bonus - we loved the two sizes. In the past I’ve gotten all adult-sizes ponchos and when we’ve traveled with nieces and nephews we’ve had to tie up the ponchos to make them fit. The kid sizes worked great for our nephew this trip - would highly recommend if traveling with littles!
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely great ponchos! We used them for a recent week long trip to Universal Orlando and they were game changers during the many pop up storms, and came in super handy keeping the poo-poo members of our group dry during water rides! Great quality - thicker plastic (not that dollar store or walmart junk - these are def reusable) and drawstring hood and elastic wrists to protect fit bits/watches are a great touch! Compact and light packaging made it easy to just shove in the bottom of a backpack and forget about until needed.
customer_reviews.author: CHMOM

customer_reviews.title: Kids sizes have short sleeves
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 10 year old twins to use and keep in their backpacks when they take the bus. The first day they used them we realized the sleeve only goes to their elbows. I thought the kids size was longer. They are average height for 10 year olds. Their coat sleeves were completely drenched. We will try the adult size
customer_reviews.author: Book M Lover

customer_reviews.title: Great for the whole family! Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for “just in case” for our Disney vacation, and what do you know... it rained!!! These were a perfect fit! Perfect weight! Long enough to cover backpacks. Truly the only less-than-ideal thing that happened was the string on the hood came out right away. Our family’s sizes range from youth medium to women’s plus (a 22-24). Every one’s poncho fit with ease comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Gates

customer_reviews.title: Great Rain Ponchos
customer_reviews.text: Made it through my trip to Disneyland during rainy weather and the water rides without getting wet, YAY!!! These rain ponchos worked great and the 8 pack was also great because there were plenty to go around. They are light weight and sturdy at the same time. Used them two days in a row without any tears, the elastic and ties on the hoody were a plus; I highly recommend. They also come in a variety of cute colors.
customer_reviews.author: mdimaggi

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this family pack because I liked that it had both adult and child size ponchos. I keep it in our pop up tent trailer for those unexpected weather changes while camping. On our last camping trip, I needed to pull out one of the child size ponchos for my 4-year old daughter. It was cold, so she had on several layers of clothes. The poncho went on easily, was a great overall length, and arm length was good. The plastic was not too flimsy. It was strong enough to endure several of hours of play time in a light rain. I also like the variety of colors available to pick from
customer_reviews.author: BC Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a 3 day camping trip. Several adults and children. This was a perfect way to make sure everyone was all set in 1 small little box. We found these ponchos to fit great, not too restricted and none of them ripped!! Perfect item to have in the car just in case, and they're packaged so compact. Worked out fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Nitetrain

customer_reviews.title: TSA will flag- pack carefully
customer_reviews.text: These were good but something to keep in mind if flying- when they go through the security screening at the airport they show up as something suspicious- they told me they looked like some kind of gel pack on the scanner. TSA will need to go through your bag and take them out, so it's a good idea to pack them in a place where it's easy to pull them out and put them back in. TSA told me that the next time I went through security with them I should just take them out and send them through separately to avoid getting pulled aside and spending more time going through the line.
customer_reviews.author: M3532

customer_reviews.title: Save money at the theme park!
customer_reviews.text: We took these to disneyworld because a blog suggested it would be much cheaper than having to purchase one there. It was so great to have them. Having adult ans kid sizes was especially helpful. The colors mad it easier to keep up with each other in the crowd. A wise and useful purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ned

customer_reviews.title: Buy if you're on the fence!
customer_reviews.text: Did awesome for our disney trip! As everyone mentioned, these are perfect for that one time use. Allows you to be very mobile. Fit the kiddies just fine. Must buy if you are on the fence about purchasing! Great individual packaging per poncho. Cool colors!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thick & Re-Usable. A+
customer_reviews.text: Bought it the night before a Disneyland trip for a group of 4 adults and I became hero of the hour when we were able to go on Grizzly River Run about 5 times in a row with no water drenching our jeans. They're very brightly colored and we felt a little silly completely strapping up, but it was amazingly useful. Fits all sizes, we had someone who was 6' and he was really well-covered. Grabbed a ziploc and scrunched them up and stored them away for another watery, Disney day.
customer_reviews.author: Christina A.

customer_reviews.title: Not meant for kids
customer_reviews.text: Adult quality and coverage is good. Material is OK OK though. For kids, we were surprised when we used it for 8 year old boy. No string for kid's hood, so kid has to keep holding it from getting off from head, no rubber/elastic for sleeves to secure hands getting wet. So when holding hood, water can easily get inside from open sleeves. So DO NOT BUY, if you are looking for kids, it is completely useless.
customer_reviews.author: Nim

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a trip to Disney World. Since we were going in June, I knew we would end up needing them. I was right! These were great; compact and easy to put in a small back pack. I liked the different colors as after they were used, we knew which poncho belonged to which family member (we needed them several days in a row). So much more economical than buying a poncho at the park. I loved that the sleeves were elastic. Ponchos were also lighter weight than those they sell at the park, which is nice due to the heat. We have had to purchase park ones in the past and these were so much better!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Malley

customer_reviews.title: Fun and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a family trip to Disney and they were perfect for our trip. Lightweight for packing and easy to carry in the park for the sudden rain showers that happen in Florida. They were durable and came with fun colors for everyone to pick from. Super speedy delivery,
customer_reviews.author: Emanning

customer_reviews.title: Worked great on the dreaded water rides!
customer_reviews.text: That’s me in the red lol. I bought this in case it rained on our trip to Florida. Turns out there was no rain, so I decided to use it for a water ride I went on. While my friends were soaked, I stayed nice and dry! They were packaged great and fit in my book bag until I needed to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these previous to a trip to Disney World to throw in a backpack to take into the parks in case it rained on us. They are lightweight but durable, come in fun colors (to my 3 girls anyway) and more than served their purpose. Absolutely perfect for what we needed them for.
customer_reviews.author: ClayM

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: These ponchos were great for the price... easy to pack, as they are packaged together in a nice small convenient square, 2 adult and 2 kids ponchos. Perfect for my son/dad camping trip. It rained the entire first day, and they stayed dry :)
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Connolly

customer_reviews.title: Came quickly - nice variety
customer_reviews.text: Taking these ponchos on a trip, and have not used them yet. But was happy to find a variety with adult and kid sizes. The only other option I've seen have been adult only. Assuming these will fit my average-to-small height elementary school kids. Nice that I could make one order and get sizes that will fit us all. These shipped and were received very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa in Atlanta

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and well worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: What a great purchase. We are going to Disney and one of the biggest tips is buy ponchos before you go. Ordered on Friday and had Saturday. They are so nice for the price. Love that they are reusable too. The colors are bright but clear. They also have a string hood to tighten up.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used yet but tried on. Fit great, good sizes for kids and adults. Plenty long but can cut off easily. Will use on a trip and this will save a lot of $$ rather than buying theme park ones for the 5 of us. Look to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: MBC

customer_reviews.title: Rained one day during our Disney trip and these saved the day
customer_reviews.text: Spent a lot of money on our Disney trip and we made sure that not even the rain will ruin any of it. Of course it rained one of the days and these came in handy. I like the different colors and I'm impressed with the quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: KA

customer_reviews.title: Does not actually have the ponchos it says it has
customer_reviews.text: Item was advertised to have 4 adult ponchos and 4 children. Package only had 4 adult ponchos. Buyer beware-false advertising
customer_reviews.author: Alan Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: These are not good quality. The hood string fell out within a few mins of putting it on. The hood is also too small to do much good. My daughter’s poncho got ripped very easily. And the kids size is meant for a 2 year old. I wouldn’t recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: EH

customer_reviews.title: Easy to pack for just in case.
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our make a wish trip to Florida. We had heard it sporadically rains in late spring/early summer so we wanted to be prepared. These are very small so easy to toss in the bottom of your backpack so you always have them on hand. Take up almost no space. We didn’t end up having to use them but we’re thankfuk we had them in case we needed them.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Wiegand

customer_reviews.title: Ponchos work well in Florida Summer Rain!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the ponchos worked well in the Florida rain during our recent trip to Orlando for some Disney magic and Legoland fun. However, they do not work so well in the wind. They are quite thin and blow up easily in the wind. A welcomed improved would be to increase thickness. I would be willing to pay more for thicker ponchos!
customer_reviews.author: Strategy Professor

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Got these for a trip to florida legoland. We got lucky and didnt need to use them for rainy days. But we did use them on a water ride at the legoland park. Kept all our clothes nice and dry while all other riders got off soaked. Loved the hood and long sleeves on these. Great price on these too, didnt feel bad for using it once and just tossing it in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Angel W.

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for Disneyland. Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for our upcoming Disneyland trips. I like how they are single pouches and easy to travel. I also like how they came multiple adult and multiple youth sizes. I haven’t used them yet but can’t wait for those rainy days at Disney.
customer_reviews.author: momof2

customer_reviews.title: Great for Disney trips
customer_reviews.text: Took these to Disney World and they fit great inside my day bag. Lightweight and I love that they come in kids and adult sizes. I gave 4 stars only because we didn’t use them in the parks (we were lucky it never rained), so I’m not sure how they perform during rain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this family pack for an upcoming trip to Disney world. Colors are bright and neatly individually packed for easy packing in my park bag. Hopefully we won’t need to use them on our trip but glad to have them just in case. Price for the pack is less then one poncho in the park so definitely a bargain. Not sure about the quality because I don’t want to remove one from the pouch for fear of not getting it back in so nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Blandi

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: They were pretty sturdy. We used them at Disneyland for two adults and three children- 12, 10, 8. They fit them all nicely and kept them dry. Not any fault of the seller or manufacturer.. but if you are wearing them in sideways blowing rain, they will still get your legs soaked. We all wore them about 4 hours with no rips or holes and that was taking them off and on for a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps out the rain
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a trip to Disney World. They were perfect for traveling and we were able to reuse them for several days. The only issue we had was no drawstring on the child's poncho so he had trouble keeping the hood on.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Tear very easily
customer_reviews.text: Description says extra thick?? Really thin and tear easily. They helped in a pinch with very fast delivery for our trip to Disney on a rainy day, but the ones that were used had to be thrown away at the end of the day because they had holes all over them.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine A.

customer_reviews.title: Ponchos worked very well
customer_reviews.text: The adult ponchos were great and in shorts and a t-shirt covered down a little past my knees (I'm 5'9"). The drawstring around the hood and the elastic wrists worked very well. My only issue was that the children's poncho doesn't have arms so unless they are in a sleeveless shirt, their sleeves will get wet.
customer_reviews.author: Mademoiselle

customer_reviews.title: 2 minor issues...
customer_reviews.text: We bought these ponchos for what turned out to be a very rainy trip to Disney World this past May. We use the ponchos every day for a week! They kept us dry without fail. I would love to give them 5 stars... except the drawstrings in the hood came out too easily. Plus both my husband and I ended up with tears under the arm of our ponchos. If not for those two simple issues these ponchos were GREAT in quality. Thanks for keeping us dry at the Happiest Place on Earth!
customer_reviews.author: Bertystevens

customer_reviews.title: Made our Disney Water rides !
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our days at Disney. Perfect! Used them over and over again! On our last day we gave them away to those waiting in line for water rides. The draw string hat is great. I used one to cover my walking boot! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Patti Phillips-Todd

customer_reviews.title: Multi purpose ponchos
customer_reviews.text: These are great ponchos! We used on a trip to Disney and they did a great job of keeping us dry enough to have a great time! We also stocked up on some more to protect us from unnecessary germs during this pandemic if we are out in public.
customer_reviews.author: bobby

customer_reviews.title: Fast service!
customer_reviews.text: We have not yet used these ponchos as they will be taken on our trip to Disney World! They are packaged well and will fit in our backpacks easily...have felt of them and they seem quite durable....will give more details after our trip!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and her family before they went to Universal Studios in Florida. They all laughed at me but took them along anyway. Well the heavens opened and they whipped out their ponchos. They couldn’t thank me enough!! They were very expensive at the park and the lines to purchase were very long!! I was the good guy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight rain wear that can be used to protect clothing.
customer_reviews.text: We were unable to obtain protective gowns for our employees during the COVID pandemic. We thought of these and ordered them. Unfortunately the children's wear is too small, but the adult works very well for most people.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Ainsworth

customer_reviews.title: Must have for raining season!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It’s compact and lightweight, we keep some in the diaper bag and a few in the car. We used it on our trip to LA around Hollywood and it kept us nice and dry. It’s a great family pack! Definitely would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Worked great Disney
customer_reviews.text: These worked great during our week at Disney. For the price, they definitely served the purpose. My only idea for improvement would be to increase the size of the knots in the adult size drawstrings. My daughter had to wear one and the string went into one side making it impossible to retrieve without tearing a hole in the poncho. I almost lost mine as well. Not a biggie, but just an idea for improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley J Perniciaro

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and easy to put on.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our family trip to DisneyWorld and these bad boys came into handy. They’re so lightweight and easy to pack & carry around. We put them to use when it poured down on us at the park. So convenient and easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: MVEI

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you dry
customer_reviews.text: The adult sizes are long and without slits up the sides, which I liked as we used them for the water rides at Disney World. I also liked how the sleeves are long with elastic around the wrists and a drawstring around the hood. Kept me totally dry and the package was, until opened, nice and compact. The kid sizes are definitely for smaller kids, probably better for under age 10.
customer_reviews.author: HME

customer_reviews.title: Better than Disney
customer_reviews.text: My family wore them during vacation in Walt Disney World. This is much better than those ponchos sold in Disney stores, (1) 8 for $13.99 vs 1 for $12.99, (2) adult poncho has sleeve vs disney no sleeve.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Brought it for the entire family for our Disney vacation, and you know it rains everyday in Fl. It was great, it is packed neatly in a small pouch and we can whip it out as soon as it starts to rain. It served the purpose for what we wanted and most importantly it didn't rip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Came in Handy at Disney......
customer_reviews.text: We packed these in our go bags for Disney...its Orlando...it rains and there is no reason to spend 10 bucks on a poncho in the gift shop for a 40 min shower. These are great to pack for the Disney Warrior. Use them, throw them away and you are still cheaper than park ponchos.
customer_reviews.author: rollingrock

customer_reviews.title: These ponchos were just what we needed for our trip ...
customer_reviews.text: These ponchos were just what we needed for our trip to Disney this week with two adults and two children (8 and 9 yrs old)! We wore them on the water rides and even to Sea World in the “Splash Zone” and stayed totally dry! Luckily we didn’t have any rain on our trip, but there is no doubt that we wouldn’t have been slowed down, knowing how well these work! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: not as advertised, the sleeves are short and loose, can't cover body
customer_reviews.text: not as advertised, the sleeves are short and loose, can't cover body :-(
customer_reviews.author: Qing Mu

product_meta.title: Lingito Rain Ponchos Family Pack | Emergency Raincoat Drawstring Hood Poncho for Children and Adults | Lightweight Reusable or Disposable 4 Pack, 8 Pack or 12 Pack
feature_bullets: 50% THICKER FAMILY PACK: Avoid the cheap ponchos and get a durable and thick material rain poncho with drawstrings Men , Women, Teens and children individually packaged
SAVE FOR YOUR TRIP TO DISNEY: You get a total of 8 ponchos 4 adult and 4 child size
EASY TO TRAVEL AND CARRY: No need to carry a heavy rain coat or umbrellas in Disney, Hiking, Concerts. Fits in your pocket or bag.
ASSORTED COLORS : As shown in images, each package contains 4 assorted contemporary colors -Kids can choose from
TRUSTED BRAND: lingito prides itself on it's quality and customer service
